actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Middle East and North Africa.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Middle East and North Africa

official_title: Congratulating the State of Qatar on the ascension of their new amir, Sheik Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani on June 25, 2013, and recognizing the special relationship between the United States and the State of Qatar.

summary.text: Congratulates His Highness Amir Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani on his ascension to the throne of Qatar. Expresses appreciation to the departing amir, Sheikh Hamad bin Khalifa Al Thani. Recognizes the continued friendship between the United States and the people of Qatar.

titles.title: Congratulating the State of Qatar on the ascension of their new amir, Sheik Tamim bin Hamad Al Thani on June 25, 2013, and recognizing the special relationship between the United States and the State of Qatar.
